lines.text: That must have happened when the dough fell in the tool chest.

[to Bill Jr]
After all the bum is your father.

[upon seeing Bill Jr. for the first time, to Tom]
If you say what you're thinking, I'll strangle you!

[gives his gun to Steamboat Bill]
There's not a jury that would convict you.
lines.character: Tom Carter - First and Last Mate

lines.text: I'll run on this river if I'm the only passenger on the boat.

[to the barber about his son's moustache]
Take that barnacle off his lip.

[to his father]
I know what it is, you're ashamed of my baking.
